Sarup recommends picking up Free Software this way.

Level 0

So you want to build things

Hackers primarily build things. That's what makes them happy.

There's a common misconception, that leads people into believing hackers are the equivalent of criminal troublemakers.. you know, breaking into your Facebook account and everything.

Hacker Attitude
programming, essays
If you wish to get started with the Free Software, I'd like to recommend reading some hacker-attitude oriented essays first. Here's the first: Eric S. Raymond's Hacker HowTo.
